html:
the offspring and the issue: i.e. direct and collateral issue, and embraces his entire kindred.

the offspring. Hebrew. hazze"eza"im. Occurs only in Job and Isaiah (Job 5:25; Job 21:8; Job 27:14; Job 31:8 , andIsaiah 34:1 ;Isaiah 42:5 ;Isaiah 44:3 ;Isaiah 48:19 ;Isaiah 61:9 ;Isaiah 65:23). See App-79.

vessels. Put by Figure of speech Metonymy (of Subject), App-6, for the kindred mentioned above.
